question: HOW CAN I CANCEL MY ORDER?

answers.para: If the order is not yet Ready To Dispatch, you can cancel your order by going to ***signin*** in your profile. Click on the CANCEL Button for the order you wish to cancel
Incase you have already paid for your order; the amount minus the processing fee of 3% will be credited back to your account within 10-14 days

question: HOW CAN I MODIFY MY SHIPPING ADDRESS?

answers.para: You can modify the shipping address if the order has not been shipped
Go to ***signin*** in your profile. Click on Change Shipping Address against that order and modify the address
Shipping charges and delivery time may vary depending on the new shipping address
